# First, I tried to categorize countries into four clusters. The average features of each clusters are
![image.png](attachment:729ce477-8489-4da0-b587-9d3d0aae6a30.png)
source.9ecec634:
# * Countries in Cluster1 are seem to be better environmnet for gender equality in social, financial, information tech and industrial point of views.
# * Countries in Cluster3 are actually higher in WBL, but there seem to be some domestic gap in society, finance and IT.
# * Countries in Cluster2 are in developed countries, but there seem to be some barriers for WBL.
# * Countries in Cluster4 are still in progress. So the important thing is how they can improve social, financial, information tech and industrial environment for better WBL.
source.d63fb013: # I chose the features which have strong positive or negative correlation (over 30% or under -30%) with WBL.
